name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export ChatGPT Conversations (MarkDown and Plain Text)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export your ChatGPT conversations into a well-formatted markdown, ready for Notion, Google Docs, or your preferred note-taking app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension that effortlessly exports your ChatGPT conversations into well-formatted markdown, ready for Notion, Google Docs, or your preferred note-taking app.

My extension supports code and mathematical symbol formatting, making it a perfect tool for developers, and researchers. Not only this is useful in documentation but also in re-prompting and prompt engineering.
